channel.title: How to make a Tutorial Tutorial
channel.description:
It is not perfect but hope you can learn something :|
How to make a Tutorial.
Step 1,
What do you want to make a Tutorial about.
Something Useless?
Then stop no point to make it.
Something that help other?
You can continue.
Step 2.
Is it here before?
If yes:
Is you adding something on it?
If no stop.
If no one Is it here before?
Continue.
Step 3.
Write about that you want to learn away.
To take picture use Print screen and paste it in paint if you want to show your whole screen. Use Sys Rq to only take picture on the window you are using. Upload on www.tinypic.com or other sites.
Step 4:
see if it work and you can learn that you should with using the Tutorial .
If you can't learn learn that!
Fix it
If you can learn that you should!
post it and you are finish.
sorry for misspell :o

item.title: How to make a Tutorial Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

This tutorial sucks. You need to go learn how to make a tutorial.

Try this thread:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Seriously though, who the hell needs this?

Read full topic

wtf was the point in this?
[/quote]

It’s for noobs who don’t know how to make a tutorial, although i do think most people know how to make a basic tutorial…[/quote]

well i was a noob when i joined and i knew how to post tutorials… and allmost all noobs dont post tutorials till they have senior member rank+
